name: Signly
0:
”Alexa open show sign”
”What is the sign for ball”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: show sign
des: This app will show you a video of how to sign thousands of words and phrases. Simply ask Alexa to show you how to sign cat as an example.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
